author: akarasulu
msg: Moved the stateful stuff in o.a.d.s.a.codec.stateful into o.a.d.s.asn1 with
the rest of the codec interfaces. Moved hex in codec.binary into asn1 since
it's not worth keeping by itself and it was causing more dependency mayhem.
Renamed the codec.actions to o.a.d.s.a.actions. Deleted all the codec pkgs.

author: mfreedman
msg: Branch the (final) Portlet 2.0 Bridge for JavaServer Faces 1.2 TCK to a new trunk to begin work on adapting to run in a Portlet 2.0 Bridge for JavaServer Faces 2.0 impl.

author: chirino
msg: Fixing bug in ssl transport.  Was not properly draining the overflow buffer.
